TextView.android:text: Equilibrio is the technical festival of Guru Ghasidas Vishwavidyalaya which became a nation wide technical festival in 2014 .It's main motto is to promote technical skills, scientific thinking and accepting innovative ideas.

Equilibrio has created an unmatched aura for science and technology attracting students , year after year.Students not only from our college, but all over India get the opportunity to showcase their skills and talent through various technical events. Equilibrio builds a sense of responsibility, team spirit,confidence and leadership qualities. Equilibrio is the most awaited festival for the students all over India.
